name: Beatshifter
description:
Beatshifter is a rhythm-platformer where you control the rotation and tilt of the environment to navigate obstacles and challenges. The Player Avatar changes shapes every 4 beats. Each shape has its own movement type; shapes have their own jump height, friction, movement speed, gravity, glide, and acceleration.

Get to the end by manipulating the landscape, if you can!

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Tilt/Yaw Environment
Space Bar     - Jump Avatar
